title: Social Night!
description: Trying to connect with fellow coders now that Covid restrictions have been lifted? Come in, socialize, make a new friend or two! Buy more than one drink at the same time and get the 2nd drink 10% off, 3rd drink 20% off, and so on! Please drink responsibly.

title: Burgers & Beer Night
description: Come in between the hours of 5pm-10pm and get 50% off any draft beer with the purchase of our famous React Burger. Think of it as extended happy hour!

title: Patio Tuesdays
description: Come join us every Tuesday out on the patio and listen to live music, live LoFi sessions, and one 25% off Royal Flush shot!
